DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare Antibacterial Efficacy Diode Laser 810nm Photodynamic therapy reduce bacterial microflora endodontic retreatment teeth periradicular lesion .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Antibacterial Effect 810 nm Diode Laser Photodynamic Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: Conventional technique root canal treatment mechanical instrumentation chemical debridement antimicrobial irrigants , Sodium hypochlorite ( NaOCl ) chlorhexidine use calcium hydroxide always suffice predictably render root canal free bacteria Using high-power diode laser new approach disinfection allow access previously unavailable area , tubular network . This study , therefore , compare two type diode laser ( low-power high power ) term anti-bacterial effect well conventional endodontic retreatment determine ideal method root canal disinfection .
